title: Blawpaw
author: Blawpaw
content: December 31 Soccer predictionsSo, I would like to leave the last predictions of 2022!England - Premier LeagueBrighton - Arsenal Arsenal is the top dog for this game, however, Brighton plays with the massive support of their fans and has shown quality football. Thus, a well-disputed match is expected, where goal opportunities will appear. In front of such a scenario, I believe the most likely scenario for this match will be for both teams to score at least one goal. Both Teams ScoreWolverhampton - Man Utd I see Manchester United as a favourite for this match, however, the home team should also have its say. It should be noted that the market "Both teams score" was a winner in the last five Manchester United away games. In this way, a very busy game is expected with several goals opportunities for both teamsBoth Teams ScoreBournemouth - Crystal PalaceIt is true that Bournemouth can be more confident about playing at home, however, in this round they receive an opponent that provides amazing good football. In addition, both teams have several defensive issues. Having said that, risking in favour of the ''Above 2,5 Goals'' market in this game is a good option.Above 2,5 goalsMan City - EvertonIn addition to Manchester being motivated after the latest results obtained, it still receives a team that has shown serious flaws in the defensive process. Everton conceded a total of nine goals in the last three matches played, and, on the other hand, Manchester City has shown its offensive potential, scoring six goals in the last two games. In this way, I expect to see the occurrence of a few goals.Above 2.5 GoalsNewcastle - LeedsThe most likely scenario for this match will be for both teams to score at least one goal. It is true that a game more controlled by the home team is expected, however, Leeds also plays good football, with a lot of offensive quality. It should be noted that the market "Both Teams Score" was a winner in Leeds' last five games, counting for the championship and in three of the last four matches between the two teams.Both Team ScoreThe wheel is turning, so let's hope to see good results!Let me hear your predictions!

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: There is no need of creating another thread for this, we have English premier league thread already which I believe you know about very well, put all your prediction there and let us enjoy discussing there about what is related to English premier league.Premier League Prediction Thread 2022/2023

comments.author: Blawpaw
comments.body: Quote from: _act_ on December 31, 2022, 11:24:41 AMThere is no need of creating another thread for this, we have English premier league thread already which I believe you know about very well, put all your prediction there and let us enjoy discussing there about what is related to English premier league.Premier League Prediction Thread 2022/2023Thansk for the heads up, but I actually wanted to create a new thread as it is supposed to be my 2022 last predictions. It so happens that my picks were only matches for the Premier league but I could have chosen different leagues for different countries...

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: May be we can have a common prediction thread. Everyone is free to post their legs and test each others luck or skill whatever you call it.Quote from: Blawpaw on December 31, 2022, 11:20:00 AMBrighton - Arsenal Over 2.5 goalsQuoteWolverhampton - Man Utd You already got it wrong. Utd finished with a 0 - 1 lead. If I were to post a prediction then I would post over 1.5 goals to be honest.QuoteBournemouth - Crystal PalaceBoth team to score.QuoteMan City - EvertonBoth team to scoreQuoteNewcastle - LeedsOver 3.5 goals

comments.author: rahmad2nd
comments.body: Quote from: Blawpaw on December 31, 2022, 11:20:00 AMDecember 31 Soccer predictionsSo, I would like to leave the last predictions of 2022!England - Premier LeagueBrighton - Arsenal Arsenal is the top dog for this game, however, Brighton plays with the massive support of their fans and has shown quality football. Thus, a well-disputed match is expected, where goal opportunities will appear. In front of such a scenario, I believe the most likely scenario for this match will be for both teams to score at least one goal. Both Teams ScoreIt seems that your prediction has missed a lot this time. however, I will not go into that. because there is only one game left, namely Brighton vs Arsenal. in fact, I have already reviewed the teams that will be competing. however, let's review again. I believe this match will be Arsenal's match, even though the Gunners will be playing as an away team. however, currently the Gunners are in a positive trending phase. The loss of Gabriel Jesus, who was absent due to injury, did not stop the Gunners' young squad from performing at high levels. now, they already have a stronger mentality and even more solid chemistry.On the Brighton side, this match is their home game. at least they have the advantage of playing as the home team. moreover, from the history of H2H in its last two matches against Arsenal. they were able to keep up with the Gunners' game, winning one match and one draw, a pretty good mental capital for De Zerbi's troops. however, I don't think this match will be easy for them because Arsenal are currently in their best form.In my estimate, Arsenal won the score 1-3.

comments.author: QueenVera
comments.body: I actually don't pay much attention to taking my time in making  predictions because to be frank, I find it very difficult  and most of my time doing soccer bettings, I mostly trust a friend to doing the betting for me because I trust my friend so much and I feel he is already good at such field.Some other time, I always use a copy trading feature on my betting app and it also helps me alot because the accuracy and winning rates of a bettor you want to copy from is been analysed and displayed on their profile.But let me give it a trial this time.I see arsenal winning or possibly a goal-goalThat's the most I can predict.

comments.author: Blawpaw
comments.body: December 31 Soccer predictionsEngland - Premier LeagueBrighton 2 - Arsenal 4Both Teams ScoreWINWolverhampton 0 - Man Utd 1Both Teams ScoreLOSSBournemouth 0 - Crystal Palace 2Above 2,5 goalsLOSSMan City 1- Everton 1Above 2.5 GoalsLOSSNewcastle 0- Leeds 0Both Team ScoreLOSSWell, I was only able to hit one of the tips and to cover for some losses. Hope you guys had better luck

comments.author: pawel7777
comments.body: Quote from: _act_ on December 31, 2022, 11:24:41 AMThere is no need of creating another thread for this, we have English premier league thread already which I believe you know about very well, put all your prediction there and let us enjoy discussing there about what is related to English premier league.Premier League Prediction Thread 2022/2023Lol, this thread is unique because these are HIS predictions, you can't force him to post in some other thread just because it also mentions Premier League. Otherwise we would only have a dozen or so of mega-threads in this section and no other posts.I enjoy his prediction posts (which are not limited to the premier league) and am glad he does that in a separate topic, as I (as well as others) can't be asked to go through hundreds of replies in mega-threads (I'd only view the few most recent post if anything).@Blawpaw - but actually creating a separate topic and just updating it for fresh predictions (rather than starting a new one each time) could work great, as it'd be easier for the others to follow. Just a thought.
